creator: guiaderodas
descriptionHtml:
Guiaderodas is now Wheelguide! It is the same app as before, but now with a more international name.

Use Wheelguide for rating the accessibility of venues and search for places that have been rated.

Even if you don't have restricted mobility, you can use Wheelguide for rating places. You will be helping millions of people who want to go somewhere, but don't know if they'll be able to get inside, such as wheelchair users.

How to rate?

Rating takes at most 30 seconds. You choose between green, yellow or red pin color and answer quick and simple questions to give your opinion about a place's accessibility:

Is the entrance good for people with restricted mobility?
Is there an accessible restroom?
Is there a family bathroom or baby changing room?

If you want you can write a comment with your impressions about the place's accessibility.

Even if a place has already been rated, you can rate it again. The more ratings, the better! You can rate and search for restaurants, city landmarks, hotels, bars, stores, public buildings...

With your help, we are building a more accessible world. Help millions of people to get out of home. Download the app and start now!

When an idea is good, it is good for everyone.

#goodideaforeveryone



AWARDS:

2016 - Wheelguide was awarded the "Best Digital Initiative for Inclusion in the World" at the World Summit Awards (WSA), organized by the United Nations (UN).

2018 - Wheelguide founding partner was chosen as one of the most influential innovators under the age of 35 by MIT Technology Review, the Massachusetts Institute of Technology magazine.

2018 - Wheelguide was awarded the "Best Mobile Application for Accessibility" at the Accessible Americas event organized by the International Telecommunication Union (ITU, the UN agency for Information and Communication Technologies).

2019 - Wheelguide was awarded as one of the best social impact companies in Latin America at the Viva Schmidheiny Awards in Jujuy, Argentina.
descriptionShort: Rate and search for accessible places for wheelchair users: restaurant, hotel...

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
- New design and tabbed browsing.
- New content tab! See news, curiosities, watch videos and much more about accessibility.
- Main tab (Home): search and assess the accessibility of places.
- Profile tab: login, signup and details of the logged in user.

descriptionShort: Rate and search for accessible places for wheelchair users: restaurant, hotel...

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
The new version of the app comes with a brand new game to help you practice reviewing real places, without leaving home! Practice your accessibility skills by voting on each photo: do you think that place is accessible or not?

Also:
- New filtering interface on place search.
- Performance improvements and bug fixes.
